item.title: Several Wall Street shops trim their Apple price targets ahead of earnings next week
item.description: Multiple banks pulled back their target prices for shares ahead of the company's quarterly financial report.

item.title: Bernstein says there's a buying opportunity in this fast casual food chain that can rally 40%
item.description: The firm raised its rating on the stock to outperform from market perform.

item.title: Tesla gets a slew of price target cuts after big earnings miss
item.description: After Tesla's first-quarter earnings miss, Wall Street analysts are wondering what's next for the electric vehicle giant.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The major averages surged on Tuesday, with the Dow jumping more than 1,000 points and breaking a four-day losing streak. Here's what CNBC is watching ...

item.title: Stick to high-quality dividend payers amid tariff turmoil, such as this energy stock, investor Tom Hulick says
item.description: Tom Hulick, CEO at Strategy Asset Managers, joined CNBC's "Power Lunch" to give his opinions on a trio of stocks.
